config.name: width
config.title: The width of the virtual viewport of the device.

config.name: height
config.title: The height of the virtual viewport of the device.

config.name: device-width
config.title: The physical width of the device's screen.

config.name: device-height
config.title: The physical height of the device's screen.

config.name: initial-scale
config.title: The initial zoom when visiting the page. 1.0 does not zoom.

config.name: minimum-scale
config.title: The minimum amount the visitor can zoom on the page. 1.0 does not zoom.

config.name: maximum-scale
config.title: The maximum amount the visitor can zoom on the page. 1.0 does not zoom.

config.name: user-scalable
config.title: Allows the device to zoom in and out. Values are yes or no.
